message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,200,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's as high as I can go.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $900,000 is still a bit low for me.  Let's meet in the middle. I'm prepared to accept $1,050,000. This is a fair price that allows both of us to walk away satisfied.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $950,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. While $950,000 is closer, I'm still hoping for a slightly higher price.  I'm willing to go down to $1,000,000 as a final offer.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm confident it will be mutually beneficial.  If this isn't agreeable, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $950,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, which would be $975,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget.
